Source.Name: ucl
Source.Summary: Portable lossless data compression library written in ANSI C
Source.Description: UCL implements a number of compression algorithms that achieve an excellent compression ratio while allowing very fast decompression. Decompression requires no additional memory.

Package.Name: ucl
Package.Summary: Portable lossless data compression library written in ANSI C
Package.Description: UCL implements a number of compression algorithms that achieve an excellent compression ratio while allowing very fast decompression. Decompression requires no additional memory.
